account_validity_period.description: The validity period (days) to disable users if they have not logged in within the period.

custom_info_for_login.description: The custom information that will be displayed upon successful login.

lockout_duration.description: The duration (minutes) to lock users out.

login_failed_times.description: The number of unsuccessful login attempts to lock users out.

period_with_login_failures.description: The period (minutes) to count the number of unsuccessful login attempts.

session_timeout.description:
The session timeout (minutes) that will apply if you or users created using your account
do not perform any operations within a specific period.

show_recent_login_info.description: Whether to display last login information upon successful login.
